div.h2: Welcome to Lockwood R-1 Home of the Tigers

div.p:
Please see the attached letter from Mr. Lasater regarding end of the year activities, graduation, and other important items.
https://5il.co/fhy4

If you are finished with any library book you have checked out through the school, you can return it when you come to pick up your packet on Friday! If you have any questions about checked out books please contact rcossins@tigersk12.org.
Lockwood R-1 is currently seeking a special education para for the 2020/2021 school year. Interested applicants should call the school (232-4513) or email Mr. Lasater (clasater@tigersk12.org).
Don't forget that round two packets need to be turned in this Friday and round three can be picked up then as well!

The mission of the Lockwood R-1 School District is to provide safe, appropriate, and comprehensive learning experiences for each student, to nurture individual potential, to promote self-esteem and to encourage individual growth in order to create lifelong learners who will be personally successful, informed, and productive citizens of their ever changing world.
